name: Desktop Defender
description:
Disclaimer: This project does not contain flashing images, but motion of the grid can make some people dizzy or have more serious health issues. Please only download it if you are certain that this will not affect your health.

This is a class project that may be worked on eventually if the idea will be liked.

Player is anti-virus which has destroy viruses entering the system until the required number of data packets is not collected in one of the terminals. There are 4 types of viruses described in the "Enemies" menu. They all have different effects on player motion, and one of them can destroy the player, ending the game.

Level is based on a simple multi-core processor architecture. The system is only represented in its shape, this game is not an accurate representation of how anti-virus software/processing hardware/etc. work.

All being said I hope you enjoy the game.
